title: Getting Started
content: Learn how to set up your account, customize your profile, and start using Roomantics effectively. This section helps new users understand the basics.

title: Creating Your First Project
content:
Step 1: Tap 'Create Project' on the dashboard.
Step 2: Name your project and choose a room layout.
Step 3: Add furniture and decorations using the catalog.
Step 4: Save and share your project with friends or clients.

title: Importing Room Designs
content: You can import 3D room designs from external sources in .obj or .gltf format. Navigate to 'Import Room' and select the file. Supported formats ensure your imported model is compatible.

title: How do I reset my password?
content: Go to Settings → Account → Reset Password. Enter your email and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

title: How do I contact support?
content: You can reach out to our support team via the Help Center or email support@roomantics.com. We respond within 24 hours.

title: Sharing Projects
content: Learn how to share your projects with others. Use the 'Share' button inside any project to generate a link or export it as a PDF.

title: Managing Notifications
content: Control which notifications you receive from Roomantics. Go to Settings → Notifications to toggle email and push notifications for new messages or project updates.

title: Advanced 3D Features
content: Explore lighting, shadows, and realistic textures for your room designs. Enable advanced 3D features in Settings → 3D Tools.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
content: Check here for common questions like account management, subscription plans, and troubleshooting.

title: Subscription & Billing
content: Understand your subscription plan, billing cycles, and how to upgrade or cancel. Navigate to Settings → Billing for full details.
